text: Toney Anaya (born April 29, 1941) is an American Democratic politician. He was the 26th Governor of New Mexico from 1983 to 1987. ==Other websites== * Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of New Mexico Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Santa Fe, New Mexico Category:Politicians from Santa Fe, New Mexico Category:New Mexico attorneys general
title: Toney Anaya
